level.heading: Effect of acceptance.
level.text: ยง28-104.2.1.1 Effect of acceptance. Except as otherwise specified in this code or in the rules of the department, for the purposes of this code, the acceptance of construction documents in accordance with such program shall have the same force and effect as the approval of construction documents after full examination by the department. Except as otherwise specified in this code or in the rules of the department, references in this code to approved construction documents or to the approval of construction documents shall also be deemed to refer to accepted construction documents or to the acceptance of construction documents, as applicable.
